- How GuardlyData works
GuardlyData analyzes your inputs as you interact with AI tools or platforms and flags sensitive data with color-coded highlights. You can choose to mask, tokenize, or encrypt flagged information instantly, ensuring compliance and security. For more control, you can expand the options to customize the level of protection applied to your data. GuardlyData works seamlessly in the background, so you can focus on your work while staying secure.

- Go beyond 
GuardlyData’s advanced data privacy and security solutions go far beyond traditional protection tools. It detects not only sensitive information, like personal identifiers, financial data, or proprietary business details, but also flags compliance risks in real-time. Using advanced techniques like tokenization, dynamic masking, and polymorphic encryption, it ensures your data remains safe during processing, sharing, and storage.

But protecting data isn’t just about encryption and compliance. That’s why GuardlyData also safeguards interactions with AI tools, such as ChatGPT. It identifies sensitive inputs and outputs, applies contextual redaction, and monitors for risks, all while ensuring alignment with global regulations like GDPR, HIPAA, and CCPA.

For professionals and organizations: Available as an easy-to-use web extension, GuardlyData seamlessly integrates into your workflow, securing your interactions without disrupting productivity. Whether you’re collaborating on tools like Slack or leveraging AI for innovation, GuardlyData quietly ensures your data stays private. Its intuitive dashboard offers real-time insights, compliance tracking, and customizable privacy settings tailored to your needs.
